original_text: Surely you must know all this, because you have lived for so long! It seems that you were already born when I created these things! 38: God is laughing at Job. Job thinks that he knows everything about God. But Job was not with God when God made the world. So Job cannot know about all the things that God has done. Surely you must know all this, because you have lived for so long! It seems that you were already born when I created these things! 38: God is laughing at Job. Job thinks that he knows everything about God. But Job was not with God when God made the world. So Job cannot know about all the things that God has done. Surely you must know all this,
korean_text: 네가 아마도 알리라 네가 그 때에 태어났으리니 너의 햇수가 많음이니라

sentences.original_text: Surely you must know all this
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 분명히 이 모든 것을 알고 있겠구나

sentences.original_text: because you have lived for so long
It seems that you were already born
Job thinks that he knows everything about God
sentences.korean_translation: 욥은 하나님에 대한 모든 것을 안다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: But Job was not with God
So Job cannot know about all the things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 욥은 모든 것들을 알 수 없다
